name: LD38 game
description:
This is "Miniature Adventure", our LD38 game! (Theme: Small World)

Programming by Antoine and Miguel

Character, tiles and levels by Antoine

Background by Miguel

Music by Simon

To rate our game, please visit: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum...

This is an after LD version which fixes some bug, you can still play the ludum dare version by downloading the ld38final4.zip down below.
